duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with fulfillment experience roadmap for all business models
Help develop clear goals to create a competitive fulfillment experience for both customers and sellers
Support strategy for new fulfillment models and channels including cross-border fulfillment
Delight Customers. Ensuring right orders and sent out to the right customers, on time.
Create monthly reports for incoming and outgoing inventory to be given to Finance Department
Proactively engage Governance and Experience internal functions, such as Service Delivery, Operations, Process, Quality, Training, and SOP to drive improvement efforts
Participate in relationship building, process development, and data flow between fulfillment and operations
Contribute to warehouse and transportation capacity planning
Responsible for inventory and supply availability
Report order fulfillment key performance indicators (KPI)

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED equivalent
